title: Game Named Megarealm Ripping Of LoL champions and skills ?
body: So on facebook i have seen some ads about a game, and in those ads i have seen 100% ripped of champions from lol, for example. this one is volibear https://www.google.com.au/search?q=magerealm+heroes&safe=off&biw=1600&bih=789&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjznr_BjabKAhUBuZQKHRrNC-MQ_AUIBygB#imgrc=LjGh7dazp8X_qM%3A . He not only looks alike, but he has the same skills and icons for skills. This one here is nami, and as you can see she has 100% same icons as the lol nami https://www.google.com.au/search?q=magerealm+heroes&safe=off&biw=1600&bih=789&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjznr_BjabKAhUBuZQKHRrNC-MQ_AUIBygB#imgrc=MinHTJNvCHdvfM%3A .Her Q in that link is the real nami ult but upside down, and the W is nami Q, and its E is her E, This one is garen https://www.google.com.au/search?q=magerealm+heroes&safe=off&biw=1600&bih=789&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjznr_BjabKAhUBuZQKHRrNC-MQ_AUIBygB#imgrc=NMsVtzcXQSBWSM%3A , it has garen Q and E as the icons. This one here is gragas https://www.google.com.au/search?q=magerealm+heroes&safe=off&biw=1600&bih=789&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjznr_BjabKAhUBuZQKHRrNC-MQ_AUIBygB#imgrc=PSCsFl6BcMO-dM%3A, This one here is ezreal https://www.google.com.au/search?q=magerealm+heroes&safe=off&biw=1600&bih=789&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjznr_BjabKAhUBuZQKHRrNC-MQ_AUIBygB#imgdii=PSCsFl6BcMO-dM%3A%3BPSCsFl6BcMO-dM%3A%3B7OcLCtE11n3hpM%3A&imgrc=PSCsFl6BcMO-dM%3A , also with same icons as his real champions skills, this character here is vayne https://www.google.com.au/search?q=magerealm+heroes&safe=off&biw=1600&bih=789&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjznr_BjabKAhUBuZQKHRrNC-MQ_AUIBygB#imgrc=bOyPLPJR-LfoJM%3A, This one here is 100% rip off of fizz https://www.google.com.au/search?q=magerealm+heroes&safe=off&biw=1600&bih=789&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjznr_BjabKAhUBuZQKHRrNC-MQ_AUIBygB#imgrc=wz5x5OC95D-3WM%3A. This one here is ashe's Sherwood forest skin https://www.google.com.au/search?q=magerealm+heroes\&safe=off&biw=1600&bih=789&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjW8OKskabKAhUBMJQKHeyvBxIQ_AUIBygB#imgrc=CJl0hS-jzqacGM%3A. I think this is not fair, to use riots champions like this, not only by using the champions design, but also their spells and icons, i am pretty sure that this comes under some sort of copyright lawsuit right?, anyway just letting you know.

replies.body:
Ya, lots of people rip off big names like League, but it's usually because they have no jurisdiction to do anything about it since they are based somewhere with lax internet IP laws, or even if they do it's not worth the effort because they really aren't losing any customers to some piddly Facebook game.

If you want to report them, you should submit it in a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to let them know.
